articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Former boss Faul acknowledges 'too many whites' in top Cricket SA jobs: 'It's something I regret'
articles.description: Jacques Faul says the raft of appointments of white males into senior positions at Cricket SA in the chaotic December 2019 period wasn't good for the organisation's transformation optics.
articles.content:
• Former Cricket South Africa chief executive officer Jacques Faul believes there were too many whites involved in top positions at CSA at the time of his appointment in December 2019.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
